title: Take a Husband for Farming - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Historical   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Ancient Times   Childhood Friends   Cooking   Family Conflict   Farming   Female Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Love Triangles   Magical Space   Orphans   Poor to Rich   Royalty   Transmigration
author: Qian Zui Wei Meng   浅醉微梦
description:
While she was opening and closing her eyes, Mu Rou Sang had finished her transmigration.

'Her background was miserable, her family was ruined, she had no parents, and she had no brothers or sisters.'

She only had one brother who was dependent on each other.>
